byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan and Amy Chozick contributed reporting.
byline.original: By ALEXANDER BURNS and GARDINER HARRIS

abstract: Hillary Clinton campaigns in Pennsylvania, Michigan and Ohio with long list of celebrities and high-wattage political leaders; in contrast, Donald Trump spends final days on campaign trail largely by himself, as leaders in Republican Party have disavowed or declined to back him.

headline.print_headline: Clinton Calls on Big Names While Trump Goes It Alone
headline.main: Big Names Campaigning for Hillary Clinton Underscore Donald Trump’s Isolation

snippet: In the final days of the race, Mr. Trump has been a lonely figure on the campaign trail, as most prominent Republicans have kept their distance....
lead_paragraph: In the final days of the race, Mr. Trump has been a lonely figure on the campaign trail, as most prominent Republicans have kept their distance.
